title: Fiddlesticks
body:
Fiddle is in a terrible spot right now. 
You spent the entirety of last season nerfing all his laning skills to the ground, forcing him to jungle, now youve thrown away his jungle build path.
And riot is just like "buy runeglaive and auto attack" .... are you high or what riot?

replies.body:
>And riot is just like "buy runeglaive and auto attack"

source please

and riot cannot make every champion viable at once, some will shine at one point and some will not.
Yeah Runeglaive is pretty terrible on him, can't lie. Basically forced to buy Cinderhulk to have a jungle item that isn't completely wasted on him and build more AP bruiser.
what about the new item that came out? i don't personally play fiddle but that item would work well with him wouldn't it?

Nah Because his cooldowns are fairly long, if you interrupt your drain to auo attack, youll be standing there for 5 seconds getting smashed.
They need to revert his E changes, if they no longer prioritized un-hit units, at least hed be able to lane again.
